mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '등산후기' "boardName", SAN_REVIEW_ID "srtId", USER_ID "user", TITLE, CREATED_DT, LIKE_CNT "likeCnt", VISIT_CNT "visitCount" FROM SAN_REVIEW_V srt WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} UNION SELECT '등산모집' "boardName", san_party_id "srtId", USER_ID "user", TITLE, CREATED_DT, LIKE_CNT "likeCnt", VISIT_CNT "visitCount" FROM SAN_PARTY_V srt WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) ORDER BY CREATED_DT DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} - 1 ) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '등산후기' "targetGb", TARGET_CD "targetCb", COMMENT_ID "commentId", USER_ID "userId", CONTENTS "contents", "CREATED_DT" "CREATED_DT", "MENTION_CNT" "MENTION_CNT" FROM COMMENT_V ctv WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TARGET_GB = 'SAN_REVIEW' UNION SELECT '등산모집' "targetGb", TARGET_CD "targetCb", COMMENT_ID "commentId", USER_ID "userId", CONTENTS "contents", "CREATED_DT" "CREATED_DT", "MENTION_CNT" "MENTION_CNT" FROM COMMENT_V ctv WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TARGET_GB = 'SAN_PARTY' ) ORDER BY "CREATED_DT" DESC OFFSET ( #{cri2.currPage} - 1 ) * #{cri2.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri2.amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT count(COMMENT_ID) FROM COMMENT_V WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND COMMENT_ID > 0
mapper.update: update user_tb set user_pic = #{userPic} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT path FROM file_tb WHERE uuid = ( SELECT user_pic FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId} )

SELECT san_Party_Id, san_Info_Id, user_Id, created_Dt, modified_Dt, title, contents, party_Dt, party_Max, items, condition FROM san_party_tb WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH:MM') <= TO_CHAR(PARTY_DT, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH:MM') AND user_id=#{userId} OFFSET ( #{currPage} - 1 ) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
